original_text: And some of the chief of the fathers, when they came to the house of the Lord which is at Jerusalem, offered freely for the house of God to set it up in his place:
korean_text: 어떤 족장들이 예루살렘에 있는 여호와의 성전 터에 이르러 하나님의 전을 그 곳에 다시 건축하려고 예물을 기쁘게 드리되

sentences.original_text: And some of the chief of the fathers
when they came to the house of the Lord
offered freely for the house of God
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 집을 위해 자발적으로 헌물을 드렸으니

sentences.original_text: to set it up in his place:
